actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce (Subsequently: Commerce, Science, and Transportation)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce (Subsequently: Commerce, Science, and Transportation).

official_title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to bring about increased levels of employment in the construction trades on an emergency basis.
short_title: Emergency Construction Trades Employment and Airport Development Act

summary.text: Emergency Construction Trades Employment and Airport Development Act - Amends the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to increase the appropriations authorized under such Act for airport development for the declared purpose of increasing employment levels in the construction trades.

titles.title: Emergency Construction Trades Employment and Airport Development Act
A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970 to bring about increased levels of employment in the construction trades on an emergency basis.
